title: Strengthening App Development Competencies: Community of Inquiry (CoI)-Based Online Science Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can apply the three core elements of the CoI framework (cognitive presence, teaching presence, social presence) to actual science classes
Learners can design science inquiry activities using a collaborative constructivist learning model in blended environments
Learners can develop assessment tools that measure learner engagement and achievement by linking online discussion forums with offline workshops
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
